string.value: CHICHIOYA|Okita, kauchipoteto! Totemo juuyoona koto o tsutaeru tame ni 1-jikan mo matta no ni, anata wa mata guraundohoggu no yoo ni nemutte imasu...
|Anata mo ohayoogozaimasu. Anata wa dooshite kinchoo shite imasu ka?

CHICHIOYA|Sate, kuurudaun. Kono yoo na. Kyoo wa anata no jinsei ni totte taisetsuna hidesu. Anata wa itsumo watashi o chuujitsu ni tasukete kurete, watashi kara ooku no koto o manande kimashita... Ippantekini, watashi wa anata ga seijin suru jiki ga kita to handan shimashita.
CHICHIOYA|Kore de anata wa honmono no otoko ni nari, yaritai koto wa nani demo dekimasu. Kazoku o tsukuru koto mo dekimasu... Shikashi, mochiron, saisho ni kyoka o motomeru kata ga yoidesu.
|Kore wa hontooni okotta no ka? ! Roogo made kono noojoo de marine sa reru no ka to omotteta!
|Tsumari, watashi wa tada, arigatoogozaimashita, anata no shinrai ni kotaerareru yoo doryoku shimasu, to iitakatta nodesu!
CHICHIOYA|Mata hinikudesuga, iitai koto wa takusan arimasu...
|Ima sugu suwatte sukina tokoro e itte iitte iu no?
CHICHIOYA|Sate, son'nani isoide handoru o nigitte iru nonara, Yuzhny ni itte Sergo ni kono pakkeeji o watashite kudasai. Anata ga toochaku suru made kaiwa o enki shimasu.
|Sugu ni toochaku shimasu! Soko ni ite kudasai, roojin.
RISA|Watashi no yooji ga owaru made koko de matte ite kudasai.
RISA|Junbi ga dekite. Tsugi e utsurimashou.
RISA|Kuso, jikan'nomudada! Kare ga koko no doko ka ni iru no wa shitte imasu! Oioi, watashitachiha jimoto no shuuraku o subete hoomon shita to kakushin shite irudarou ka?

|Hai, subete no mura, anata no itta tooridesu. Tashika ni, Guruhoe mura wa ato 1-tsu nokotte imasu. Shikashi, sokode anata no seihin no kaite ga mitsukaru koto wa machigai arimasen. Ittai nani o sagashite iru nodesu ka?
RISA|Sore de, naze koko de watashi o damasu nodesu ka? Soko ni tsuku hoohoo?
|Jitsuwa koko kara kita ni yamakage ga ari, sugu chikakuna nodesuga, chokutsuu suru michi ga arimasen. Watashitachiha Yuzhny o tsuuka suru hitsuyoo ga arimasu...

RISA|Koko de watashitachi no michi wa wakaremasu. Watashi wa anata no nanbasen no atowoounoni unzari shite imasu. Sore ni, anata no iku michi ga nai tokorode wa, watashi no kuruma wa rakuraku to toorisugite ikimasu.
RISA|Anata wa keiyaku no jibun no bubun o mamorimashita. Okane wa hokan shite oite kudasai.
|Kanojo wa nani o sagashite ita nodeshou ka? Moo ienikaeru jikandesu. Chichi ga naze son'nani shinpai shite ita no ka ga wakarimasu.

TOOZOKU FERIKKUSU|Soshite koko ni watashitachi no toraburumeekaa ga yattekimasu. Watashi no joohoo-kin ni yoru to, anata wa Risa o ashisutanto to shite sagashita to no kotodesuga, kanojo wa kandaina on'nanokodesu...
TOOZOKU FERIKKUSU|1000 Koin no sasayakana kifu de, anata wa kegareta kooi o tsudzukeru koto ga deki, sarani watashitachi no sapooto o tayori ni suru koto mo dekimasu.
|Anata wa nani ni tsuite hanashite iru nodesu ka? Kono yoona okane wa doko kara nyuushu dekimasu ka? Sore de, somosomo anatahadaredesu ka?
TOOZOKU FERIKKUSU|Seishin-teki songai o hoshoo suru tame ni, anata no kuruma o utte buhin o nyuushu suru hitsuyoo ga arimasu. Kare o taoshimasu!
TOOZOKU FERIKKUSU|Mata aimashoo, koinu! Watashi no kotoba o mamotte kudasai, anata wa Ferikkusu ni te o dashita koto o kookai surudeshou! Ikimashou!
|Nantekotta! Chichioya! Ittai don'na kaibutsu ga son'na koto o suru nodarou… watashi ga aishi, shitteita hitohamina shinde shimatta…

|Karera no tame ni watashi ga dekiru koto wa tada hitotsu, fukushuudesu! Satsujin-sha ga don'nani tooku ni kakurete ite mo, chinohate demo watashi wa yatsu o mitsukete yaru! Soshite, watashi wa sore o hakai shimasu! Kikoemasu ka, kanarazu mitsukemasu!
|Ferikusu ga nakama o atsumete muboobina mura o koogeki shitara doo narudeshou ka? Moshi soonara, kare wa ikite wa ikemasen! Kare wa Yuzhny baa o otozuremasu. Soko kara kensaku o hajimemasu.
|Chichi no adawoutsu zo!
TOOZOKU FERIKKUSU|Min'na onajimi no kao. Kono namaikina otoko ni misetekudasai!
|Sore dakedesu ka? Kooseina tatakai ni sanka shite kudasai!

TOOZOKU FERIKKUSU|Soshite otoko wa maekagamide wa arimasen... Kare wa doko de sono yoona buki o teniireta nodesu ka? Soodesune, nanika o umaku yaritainara, jibun de yareba ii nodesu. Waki e shirizoite kudasai.
|Ima, anata wa jibun no tsumi no tame ni shinu koto ni narimasu!

TOOZOKU FERIKKUSU|Mattekudasai, watashi wa koko nan-nen mo dare mo koroshite imasen. Jimoto juumin to kyootei o musunde imasu! Watashinoie ni shin'nyuu shite hitobito o kizutsuke hajimeta no wa anatadesu!
|Mura zentai o yakiharau chikara to dokyoo o motte iru no wa anata dakedesu!
TOOZOKU FERIKKUSU|Guruhoi shusshin'na ndesu ne! Shinjite kudasai, soreha watashitachide wa naku, kinrin no chiiki kara no tsuaaaatisutodeshita!
|Anata ga uso o tsuite iru!
TOOZOKU FERIKKUSU|Chichi no haka ni chikatte! Tomodachi no Risa ni kiite mite kudasai. Kanojo wa subete o mite imashita.
|Dooshite shitte imasu ka?
TOOZOKU FERIKKUSU|Sorede kanojo wa watashitachi ni sore ni tsuite hanashimashita. Soshite kanojo wa kita e isoida. Pesuto e.

|Risa… kanojo ga ko no subete ni nanrakano katachi de kankei shite iru yoona ki ga suru… watashi wa kanojo o mitsukete, jissai ni nani ga okotta no ka shirabete miru. Wakatta, Ferikkusu, inochi wa tasukete ageru. Shi hookoo subete ni susumimasu. Nidoto korera no bubun de kao o miseru no wa yamete kudasai.
TOOZOKU FERIKKUSU|Anata wa kachimashita. Demo, mata o ai shimashou, sonotoki wa motto junbi o totonoete okimasu.
KAKUMEI TEKI EDO|Yokatta, kono akutoo-tachi ni dare ga bosuna no ka o shimeshimashita!
|Aa kamisama, otoosan! Koko de nani ga okotta nodeshou ka? Kore o sakusei shita no wa daredesu ka?

CHICHIOYA|Chuuibukaku mimiwokatamukeru. Anata wa watashi no yooshidesu. Kore o uketotte kudasai, kore wa anata no hontoo no chichioya no monodesu. Ben dorosseru o sagase. Kare wa kenkyuushadesu. Kare wa tasukete kurerudeshou... Musuko yo... Nikushimi ni... Anata no... Tamashii o doku sa senaide...
|Watashinojinsei…-ji wa nani o sureba iideshou ka? Watashiniha dare mo nokotte inai... Nanimonai... Kono tegami dake...

TEGAMI|"Musuko yo, anata ga kono tegami o yonde iru to iu koto wa, watashi ga modotte kite anata o sodateru koto wa dekinakatta to iu kotodesu. Piitaa ga kono shigoto de subarashii shigoto o shita koto o watashi wa shitte imasu. Totemo wakakute chikaradzuyoi anata o miru to, namida ga afurete kimasu..."

TEGAMI|"...Anata ga seichoo suru toki ni soko ni i rarenakatta jibun o semete imasu. Soshite, kore wa watashi no osoroshii batsudesu. Shikashi, soodenakereba watashiniha dekinakatta koto o shitte kudasai. Watashiniha shoogai ni wataru choosen ga matteimasu..."

TEGAMI|"...Jibun no keikaku o tassei suru koto ni yotte nomi, watashi wa ochitsuki, futatabi ningen no yoo ni kanjiru koto ga dekimasu. Soodenakereba... Watashiniha ikiru kachi ga nai. Kono tegami wa shazaidesu. Dekireba yurushitekudasai. Anata wa itsumo watashi no kokoronouchi ni imasu, musuko."

|Kore de zenbudesu ka? Setsumei ga arimasen... Mattaku shiranaihito o doo yatte yurusu koto ga dekimasu ka? Koko de watashi ga dekiru koto wa nani mo nokotte inai. Ben o sagashi ni ikimasu. Sore ga daredeare, watashi ga jibun jishin o mitsukeru no o tetsudatte kureru koto o negatte imasu. Osoraku Yujini no hito-tachi wa kare no koto o kiita koto ga arudeshou ka?
Hajimete purei shimasu. Asobikata o setsumei suru chuutoriaru messeeji ga hitsuyoodesu ka?
Kono eria o hanaretaidesu ka?
Kono michi ga doko ni tsudzuite iru no ka wakaranainode, koko ni tomarimasu.
Nani ka kimyoona basho. Koko kara hanareta hoo ga ii yo.

@ffffffff| Rekishi wa, saigai chokugo ni otozureta ankoku jidai ni tsuite no seikakuna joohoo o hozon shite imasen. Tashika ni shira rete iru no wa, hitobito wa boogo masuku no okage de osen sa reta kuuki no naka de ikinobita to iu kotodesu. Michi no hatsumei-sha no kono sakuhin wa, subete no hito o byoodoo ni shimashita. Sakerarenai shi ni tachihadakatta usui shooheki wa, aratana jinrui no shoochoo to natta. Masuku wa hitobito o danketsu sa se, taiyoo no shita de jibun no ibasho o motomete tatakau chikara o ataemashita.|| Atarashii nyuushoku-chi wa, shuudan bochi to natta izen no toshi kara tooku hanareta tokoro ni shoojita. Jojoni, kotonaru seizon-sha no guruupu-kan ni tsunagari ga kakuritsu sa remashita. Noomin, koozanroodoo-sha, shoonin - tanjun'na shokugyoo e no kaiki wa, konran shita hitobito ni rieki o motarasu dakedeshita.|| Shikashi, hito wa itsu demo hitodesu. Nanseiki ni mo watatte chie o hozon shite kita hitobito wa, sore o sekai to kyooyuu suru tame ni nokorimashita. Soozoo yori hakai o konomu mono mo ita.

@ffffffff| Rekishi wa, saigai chokugo ni otozureta ankoku jidai ni tsuite no seikakuna joohoo o hozon shite imasen. Tashika ni shira rete iru no wa, hitobito wa boogo masuku no okage de osen sa reta kuuki no naka de ikinobita to iu kotodesu. Michi no hatsumei-sha no kono sakuhin wa, subete no hito o byoodoo ni shimashita. Sakerarenai shi ni tachihadakatta usui shooheki wa, aratana jinrui no shoochoo to natta. Masuku wa hitobito o danketsu sa se, taiyoo no shita de jibun no ibasho o motomete tatakau chikara o ataemashita.|| Atarashii nyuushoku-chi wa, shuudan bochi to natta izen no toshi kara tooku hanareta tokoro ni shoojita. Jojoni, kotonaru seizon-sha no guruupu-kan ni tsunagari ga kakuritsu sa remashita. Noomin, koozanroodoo-sha, shoonin - tanjun'na shokugyoo e no kaiki wa, konran shita hitobito ni rieki o motarasu dakedeshita.|| Shikashi, hito wa itsu demo hitodesu. Nanseiki ni mo watatte chie o hozon shite kita hitobito wa, sore o sekai to kyooyuu suru tame ni nokorimashita. Soozoo yori hakai o konomu mono mo ita.
Haadotorakku no Mokushiroku||Geemu no taiwakata herupu|shisutemu o shiyoo shimasu ka?
